title.rendered: Video Winners for the UKSDC National Finals March 18 and 19

content.rendered:
We feel privileged to invite the following video entry teams to the National SDC Finals:

In alphabetical order.

  • City of London Freeman’s 11
  • Craigmount High School 8
  • Derby Grammar School 8
  • Dulwich College 11
  • The Henrietta Barnett School 6
  • Riddlesdown Collegiate 12
  • St Paul’s School 5
  • St Michael’s Catholic Grammar School 12
  • Waid Academy 10
  • Westminster Academy 4

Runners Up;

(If an invited team is unable to attend they will be replaced by one of the following teams, starting with the first runner up.

  1. Pate’s Grammar School
  2. Clitheroe Royal Gammar
  3. St Mary Redcliffe and Temple School
  4. Leasowes High School
